import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import post1 from './components/Post1' import { Alert } from 'react-alert' function BlogPostDetails() { console.log(post1) let { postid } = useParams() console.log("postid",postid) const CONTENTMAPPER = (content,id) => { return(

by: {content.author}

{content.published}

views: {content.views}

comments: {content.comments}

{content.body}

) } return (
{post1.map(CONTENTMAPPER)}
) } export default BlogPostDetails
